material.mattext: What are the hypotheses that are being tested here? Be sure that you define clearly the parameters that you are using.

The hypotheses that being tested here are: Ho : μ<font size="8">1</font> = μ<font size="8">2</font> = μ<font size="8">3</font> Ha : not all the μ's are equal Where: μ<font size="8">1</font> = mean CFF of people that have brown eyes. μ<font size="8">2</font> = mean CFF of people that have green eyes. μ<font size="8">3</font> = mean CFF of people that have blue eyes.
